## 2. Coefficient of Determination

The coefficient of determination of a [linear regression model](www.r-tutor.com/node/91) is the quotient of the [variances](www.r-tutor.com/node/42) of the [fitted values](www.r-tutor.com/node/92) and observed values of the dependent variable. If we denote $y_i$ as the observed values of the dependent variable, $\bar{y}$ as its [mean](www.r-tutor.com/node/35), and $\hat{y}_i$ as the fitted value, then the coefficient of determination is: 

$$\frac{\sum\left(\hat{y}_i - \bar{y}\right)^2}{\sum\left(y_i - \bar{y}\right)^2}$$
